Anthroposophy NYC is in the industry of Record, Video & Book Stores, and also Retail. What does Anthroposophy NYC do? Anthroposophy NYC is the New York City Branch of the Anthroposophical Society in America. We are dedicated to unite spiritual truths with life's realities to nurture a shared community, inspired by the work of Rudolf Steiner. Due to the coronavirus pandemic, our physical spaces - bookstore and auditorium - are currently closed. We intend to open our doors for in person activities and bookstore in September, after Labor Day, as NYC reopening guidelines allow. Meanwhile, participate in our online programs and engage in our blogs-read them and write down your comments. And share on social media, of course. What are Anthroposophy NYC social links?
